Package uk.ac.tees.bronze.L1087591

This package contains the solution to the BRONZE task for AJP-P4 which uses the Chain of responsibility design pattern with interface.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MalfunctionHandler
    MalfucntionHandler is a interface that all concrete classes that implement it needs to implement the abstract methods and demonstrate the chain of responsibility design pattern.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Captain
    Captain represent the last item from the chain of responsibility.
    Engineer
    Engineer represent the third chain of the pattern
    FileUtility
    FileUility is a class for manipulating files, writting/reading/reset.
    Malfunction
    Malfunction is responsible for the severity and the description of the problem.
    ServiceRobot
    ServiceRobot is the second chain of the responsibility.
    SpaceMonkey  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Severity
    Severity is a enum with the prespective to reduce the runtime errors to compile time errors.

Package uk.ac.tees.bronze.L1087591 Description

This package contains the solution to the BRONZE task for AJP-P4 which uses the Chain of responsibility design pattern with interface.
